net.proteusframework.core.mail

Interface MessageFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageFilterAdapter

    public interface MessageFilter
    MessageFilter provides implementers the possibility of transforming, filtering, and adding to a message as it is built.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • acceptRecipient

        boolean acceptRecipient(MailMessage.DestinationType type,
                      EmailAddress address)
        Accept the specified recipient.
        Parameters:
        type - the type.
        address - the address.
        Returns:
        true if the recipient is acceptable, false otherwise.

      • getAdditionalAttachments

        MailPart[] getAdditionalAttachments()
        Get additional attachments.
        Returns:
        additional attachments or an empty array.

      • getAdditionalBodyContent

        MailPart[] getAdditionalBodyContent()
        Get additional body content.
        Returns:
        additional body content or an empty array.

      • transformAttachment

        MailPart transformAttachment(MailPart fileMailPart)
        Transform the mail part.
        Parameters:
        fileMailPart - the mail part to transform.
        Returns:
        a transformed MailPart or the original if no transformation took place.

      • transformBody

        MailPart transformBody(MailPart fileMailPart)
        Transform the mail part.
        Parameters:
        fileMailPart - the mail part to transform.
        Returns:
        a transformed MailPart or the original if no transformation took place.

      • transformRecipient

        EmailAddress transformRecipient(MailMessage.DestinationType type,
                              EmailAddress address)
        Performs some transformation on the recipient.
        Parameters:
        type - the type.
        address - the address.
        Returns:
        the original address or a transformed address. Do not return null. If you wish to reject the address, implement acceptRecipient(MailMessage.DestinationType, EmailAddress) .

      • transformSubject

        String transformSubject(String subject)
        Transform the specified subject.
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject to transform.
        Returns:
        the transformed subject or the original if no transformation took place.
